Html:
Trying to help out in what ways I can...since I haven't seen one around the internetz, I've compiled a new and hopefully finalized version of the raid buffs/debuffs.  Perhaps this can help in some way....feedback is appreciated on if I missed something or got something wrong.

http://www.wowhead.com/forums&topic=169946&p=2323045
I believe Astrylian already set up all the Cata Buffs but if we find something mismatched it's nice to have the double-check.

Aye, I did, but double-checking against that will be great. However, I do know that the actual numbers on those buffs are wrong in several cases. In the source code currently it uses those numbers from Wowhead, but I know some of them are simply wrong.
